title: Represent and analyze new v_max and a_max of bloc

content.question: A block oscillates along the x-axis according to the equation <math alttext="the second derivative of x, with respect to t, equals negative C x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mi>C</mi><mi>x</mi></math>, where <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi></math> is time and <math alttext="C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>C</mi></math> is a positive constant with appropriate units. The block has a maximum velocity <math alttext="v sub max" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mi>max</mi></msub></math> and a maximum acceleration <math alttext="lowercase a sub max" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>a</mi><mi>max</mi></msub></math>. If the value of <math alttext="C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>C</mi></math> is doubled and the amplitude of oscillation is kept the same, what are the block’s new maximum velocity and maximum acceleration?

choices.label: <math alttext="the square root of 2, end root, v sub max" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt><msub><mi>v</mi><mi>max</mi></msub></math> and <math alttext="2 lowercase a sub max" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>a</mi><mi>max</mi></msub></math>

<math alttext="2 v sub max" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>v</mi><mi>max</mi></msub></math> and <math alttext="the square root of 2, end root, lowercase a sub max" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt><msub><mi>a</mi><mi>max</mi></msub></math>

<math alttext="2 v sub max" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>v</mi><mi>max</mi></msub></math> and <math alttext="4 lowercase a sub max" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>4</mn><msub><mi>a</mi><mi>max</mi></msub></math>

<math alttext="4 v sub max" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>4</mn><msub><mi>v</mi><mi>max</mi></msub></math> and <math alttext="2 lowercase a sub max" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>a</mi><mi>max</mi></msub></math>
